data.name: CarX Drift Racing Online - Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
Do you need more drift?

More cars? More vinyls and stickers? More body kits and wheels? More tracks where you can feel goosebumps every turn? More burned tires and screeching brake discs?

So what are you waiting for?

Get access to all released and upcoming CarX Drift Racing Online DLCs with the Season Pass!

Details of the update:

* Access to all released DLCs
* Access to all future DLCs

Does don include CarX Drift Racing Online - Deluxe DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 or AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce 950GT / AMD R9 270)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
